solution.text:
Curved surface area of the tent\(=_{{trunc((pi_val*l*(k**2+l**2)**Decimal(0.5)),2)}}_m^2\)
Rate of painting\(=\)Rs.\(10\) per \(0.5\)sq.m.\(=\)Rs.\(20\) per sq.m.
Cost of painting each tent\(=\) Curved surface area of the tent \(\times\) rate of painting
\(=_{{trunc((pi_val*l*(k**2+l**2)**Decimal(0.5)),2)}}_ \times 20\)
\(=\)Rs.\(_{{trunc((pi_val*20*l*(k**2+l**2)**Decimal(0.5)),2)}}_\)

content.text: Cost of painting each tent from the outside if cost of painting is Rs.\(10\) per \(0.5\)sq.m.
